com.android.build.transform.api
Interface ScopedContent

All Known Subinterfaces:
TransformInput, TransformOutput
@Beta
public interface ScopedContent

Represent content manipulated during the build.

The content has a type (classes, dex, resources), a format (jar(s), folder(s)), and a scope (project, external library, sub-project, etc...).

This interface does not actually represent the content itself. This is provided by children interfaces.

Nested Class Summary
static class ScopedContent.ContentType
          The type of of the content.
static class ScopedContent.Format
          The format in which the content is represented.
static class ScopedContent.Scope
          The scope of the content.
 
Method Summary

          Returns the format of the stream.
 java.util.Set<ScopedContent.Scope> getScopes()
          Returns the scope of the stream.
 

Method Detail

getContentTypes

@NonNull
java.util.Set<ScopedContent.ContentType> getContentTypes()
Returns the type of content that the stream represents.

It's never null nor empty, but can contain several types.

getScopes

@NonNull
java.util.Set<ScopedContent.Scope> getScopes()
Returns the scope of the stream.

It's never null nor empty, but can contain several scopes.

getFormat

@NonNull
ScopedContent.Format getFormat()
Returns the format of the stream.
